snippet: President Obama's inauguration festivities at the Capitol will have a distinctly New York flair, thanks to the man who is running them: the ultimate New Yorker, Senator Charles E. Schumer.
abstract: President Obama's inauguration festivities at the Capitol will have a distinctly New York flair, thanks to the man who is running them: the ultimate New Yorker, Senator Charles E. Schumer.

headline.main: This Inauguration Brought to You by the State of New York
